content: AI is shaking up small businesses. Guide to Lofoten's story shows how ChatGPT is sidelining local sites in favor of big aggregators. SEO and info businesses need to adapt or risk obsolescence. #AIImpact

images.alt: Text: 'This is how ChatGPT is killing our small local business.'
Text explaining aggregator bias and SEO dynamics favoring big platforms.
Text discussing stopping in-depth guides and impact on travelers.
